Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $389.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:14:38 UTC – Details)

Product Description

ATOPNUC Mini PC, Powerful & Professional Mini computers.

ATOPNUC Mini computers comes with Windows 11 Pro installed.

Why choose ATOPNUC Mini PC?

-Small size only 4.94*4.41*2.05 inches, ideal portable mobile office computer.-8th Gen Intel Core i5-8279U up to 4.1Ghz, power processing multiple task.-Pre-installed Windows 11 Pro operation system, also supports Ubuntu & Linux.-16GB DDR4 & 512GB SSD, large compacity ensure running multi-tabs no lagging, don’t slow down the operation drastically, flexible expansion: RAM to 32GB maximum, SSD to 1TB maximum.-Dual 4K screen display. support connect with two 4k@30Ghz screen for multiple task handling at the same time.-Multi-Ports more function, 4 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x USB-C, 2 x HDMI ports, 1 x Gigabit Ethernet port, 1 x Micro SD Card port, 1 x Headphone Microphone Port.-Strong wireless 2.5Ghz+5G dual band WiFi5, 1000 Mb/s Gigabit Ethernet + bluetooth 5.0, Keyboard/Mouse connected works flawlessly.-Quiet Fan work silent, doesn’t overheat. the fan beneath the mini pc. high performance heat dissipation for the hardware.

The feature of ATOPNUC Mini desktop PC:

Specification of ATOPNUC Mini PC:

Processor Intel Coffee Lake i5 8279U (6M Cache, up to 4.1 GHz) Graphics Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655 (300 MHz-1.15GHz, support 4K@60Hz) Memory 16GB, Dual-channel DDR4-2400, support DIY up to 32GB Storage 512GB (M.2 PCIE 2280 SSD), support install 1*2.5″ SATA HDD (7 mm), up to 2 TB Operating System Windows 11 Pro , also support Ubuntu & Linux Wireless Connectivity Bluetooth 5.0 & 2.5G+ 5G Dual-Band Wi-Fi Video Output 2* HDMI (4K@30Hz) Audio Output HDMI, Display Port, 3.5mm Audio Jack Gigabit Ethernet 1000Mbps LAN Power Adapter Automatics Voltage adjustment between 100 and 240V AC,50/60Hz, 65Watts(19V/3.42A) VESA Mount Included Kensington Lock Yes Interface 4*USB 3.0 ports， 1* Type-C ports, 2* HDMI port, 1* Gigabit Ethernet Port, 1* TF card reader

Intel 8th Gen Core i5-8279U Professors

The Mini pc comes with Intel 8th Gen Core i5-8279U Professors with 4 cores & 8 threads. base operating frequency is 2.40 GHz/s rising to a 4.10 GHz in burst mode.

Large Expandable Storage

The mini desktop computer comes with 16GB DDRS RAM expandable to 32GB maximum and 512GB NVME SSD supports 2.5 inch SSD or HDD expandable 2TB storage capacity (not included)) to expand storage.

Dual 4K@30Hz HDMI Ports

the mini desktop PC equipped with 2 HDMI ports supports 4K@30Hz dual screen display, running the 4K UHD video smooth without any issues.

High performance heat dissipation

This small form factor PC has a user-friendly and intimate design. Fan and heat sink dual boost, cooling the Mini PC when the PC runs the heavy job but a trade-off to keep the PC running efficiently without any issue.

Mini size & Power performance

The mini computers is only 4.94*4.41*2.05 inch, portable design, you can carry it anywhere, perfect mobile office pc for business. even the small pc size but the performance is powerful, parallelly used multi-tabs without any issue and playing multiple web browsing and video windows together definitely works as well.

Easy to Installation with VESA mount

The micro desktop computer shipped with VESA mount, easy to install the PC on the wall or back of the monitor or TV. saving space and convenient carry the PC to anywhere while business trips.

Multiple Application MINI PC

FAQ of the ATOPNUC Mini PC:

Q1: is the Windows 11 Pro already installed?

A: Yes, ATOPNUC mini pc comes with Windows 11 Pro pre-installed. no need activation key.feel free to use other operating system, such as Linux, Ubuntu…

Q2: How to enter BIOS?

A: turn on the portable mini computers firstly. press and hold the ” F2 ” key until enter the BIOS.

Q3: Can i change the operation system?

A:Yes, you can change the operation to Windows 10 or Ubuntu, Linux and others by yourself or contact with us to get the update file.

Q4: How can i enable multi-screen?

A: The small pc comes with dual 4K@30Hz HDMI ports can be extended to connect to two monitors, allowing you to handle multi-task at the same time.

Q5: Is the copact pc noisy when running?

A: To cool the machine’s hardware, ATOPNUC Mini PC only produces about 30 decibels of fan sound when fully loaded. Most of the time it’s within the normal range. silent fan and high performance for the cooling.

Kindly Notes:

Please read the User Manual carefully before using the ATOPNUC Mini PC to learn more about it.

Any questions please feel free to let us know at the first time before you use or need update the software.

Our Type-C port only data transfer, please kindly note it.

CPU
Intel Core i5-8279U Intel Core i5-1135G7 AMD Ryzen 5 5600U AMD Ryzen 7 3750H Intel Celeron N4020

2.4GHz up to 4.1 GHz 2.4GHz up to 4.2 GHz 2.3GHz up to 4.2 GHz 2.3GHz up to 4.0 GHz 1.1GHz up to 2.8GHz

Operation System
Windows 11 Pro Windows 11 Pro Windows 11 Pro Windows 11 Pro Windows 10 Pro

[Intel i5-8279U Mini PC with Win11 Pro] Mini computers featuring the intel i5-8279U processor, 4 cores 8 thead, 6MB Cache, Max Turbo frequency up to 4.1 Ghz, this mini computers has desktop-grade performance, efficient core able to handle multi-task, the small computer delivers high performance for a widely hom, office, gaming, business use.
[Large Storage Expansion &Quiet] Mini desktop computers comes with high speed 16GB DDR4 memory and 512GB NVMe M.2 SSD, allow the computer handle the several operations at the same time, expand the capacity with M2 SSD/NVM2 SSD interface to 1TB or 2.5 inch SATA HDD up to 2TB(not included).
[Multi-Port, Fast transfer] Windows 11 mini computers equipped with 4 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x USB-C, 2 x HDMI 1.4 ports, 1 x Gigabit Ethernet port, 1 x Micro SD Card port, 1 x Headphone Microphone Port. , USB-C port support 10Gbps Super speed data transfer. WiFi 2.4G+5G Dual Band networking ensures stable, high-speed data transfers, even in crowded networking environments. Bluetooth 5.0 connect faster Speed, Farther Coverage.
[4K resolution and Dual Display Monitor] The micro desktop computers comes with integrated Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655 in stunning 4K UHD resolution, Dual HDMI port ensure connector with two monitors, feel free to enjoy TVs and video, home theater.
[Perfect heat dissipation, Low noise] The ATOPNUC mini computer equipped with the high performance cooling fan, runs quietly cool down the mini desktop pc’s hardare to be perfectly heat dissipation.
Connectivity Technology : LAN
Wireless Comm Standard : 802_11_AC

Price: $459.90 - $439.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:27:57 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Model: Beelink SER5560UProcessor: AMD Ryzen 5 5560U 2.3-4.0GHz, 6 Cores 12 Threads, L2 3MB L3 8MB;Processor Graphics: AMD Radeon Graphics 6core 1600 MHz;OS: Windows 11 Pro 64 bits pre-installed. support Windows 10 and Ubuntu.RAM: 16GB 3200Mhz DDR4 (2 x DDR4 Slots, up to 64GB) ;Disk: 500GB M.2 2280 NVMe SSD (up to 2TB);Extended storage: 2.5 inch 7mm SATA SSD/ HDD, up to 2TB.Thermal Design Power (TDP): 15W~25W;Ethernet: 1 x 1000Mbps LAN ;WiFi: WiFi 6E (802.11ax), Bluetooth 5.2 ;Packages & Accessories: 1 x Beelink SER5 Mini PC, 2 x HDMI Cables, 1 x US Power adapter 19V 3A , 1 x Wall Mounting bracket. 1 x Manual.

Upgrade-Friendly

Gaming

Equipped with AMD Radeon Graphics, Beelink SER5 is also a high-performing gaming PC, can run games at significantly higher frame rates, enjoy the game with friends without hindrance.

Stunning Visuals

Take entertainment to Ultra HD. You can enjoy 4K visuals with the AMD Radeon Graphics or expand your viewing area with 2 displays featuring Dual HDMI Port .

Daily essentials

Beelink SER5 is an affordable and space-saving solution that helps you get work done. Browse the web, check emails, or do word processing as you would on any normal PC.

【High Performance】Powered with AMD Ryzen 5 5560U CPU (6Core/12 threads. 2.3 ~ 4.0 GHz). 16GB DDR4-RAM and 500GB M.2 NVMe SSD Pre-installed with Windows 11 Pro 64bit, automatically activated after connecting to the Internet.Supports Ubuntu and Windows 10.
【Dual 4K output】the SER5 mini PC comes with integrated AMD Radeon graphics 6-core 1600 MHz. 4K@60Hz dual display output supplied via dual HDMI ports that allow you to easily multitasking. Stream 4K video, edit media, work from home or do your homework. Get ready for incredible graphics, sound and performance.
【Large capacity】Installed DDR4 16GB RAM (2x SODIMM slot, can be upgraded to 64GB), installed 500GB M.2 NVMe SSD (up to 2TB) and can expand the storage via 2.5 inch 7mm SATA HDD slot for your personal needs.
【Small and powerful】Easy to set up and configure. Saves desk properties and uses less energy than equivalent alternatives. Metal Frame Design It is widely used for light games, image editing, office applications, media centres, mini servers and much more.
【Other functions and guarantee】Supports RTC wake up/wake on lan/auto power on (BiOS setting)/network boot. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions. We offer lifetime technical support, 2 year worry-free warranty and 24 hours customer service.

  • Model: Beelink SER5560U
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5560U 2.3-4.0GHz, 6 Cores 12 Threads, L2 3MB L3 8MB;
  • Processor Graphics: AMD Radeon Graphics 6core 1600 MHz;
  • OS: Windows 11 Pro 64 bits pre-installed. support Windows 10 and Ubuntu.
  • RAM: 16GB 3200Mhz DDR4 (2 x DDR4 Slots, up to 64GB) ;
  • Disk: 500GB M.2 2280 NVMe SSD (up to 2TB);
  • Extended storage: 2.5 inch 7mm SATA SSD/ HDD, up to 2TB.
  • Thermal Design Power (TDP): 15W~25W;
  • Ethernet: 1 x 1000Mbps LAN ;
  • WiFi: WiFi 6E (802.11ax), Bluetooth 5.2 ;
  • Packages & Accessories: 1 x Beelink SER5 Mini PC, 2 x HDMI Cables, 1 x US Power adapter 19V 3A , 1 x Wall Mounting bracket. 1 x Manual.

Product Description

Choose KAMRUI, Choose Professional Mini PC

KAMRUI JK06 FANLESS MINI DESKTOP PC

—A partner you need whether in the office or at home—

Are you still worried about your traditional desktop pc taking up a large space? Don’t worry!

The new KAMRUI JK06 mini pc with the magnetic stand is a sleek alternative to a traditional tower PC.

■ The fanless design, more silent!

■ Honeycomb design, more solid!

■ The magnetic stand, more steady!

■ Expandable storage, more capacity!

■ Compact size and lightweight, more flexible!

■ The 11th gen N5100 processor with low consumption, more durable!

Add More Power to Your Workspace with the KAMRUI JK06 Mini PC with 11th-gen Intel processor

The fanless mini pc is equipped with an 11th generation Intel Jasper Lake N5100 (4M Cache, up to 2.90 GHz ) processor. Compared to the Intel Celeron Jasper Lake N5095 (15W), a low-power 6W Mini computer that reduces power consumption by up to 150%. For performance, the JK06 mini computer tower is improved by 30% more than Intel Celeron J4125. Lower power consumption makes it generate less heat and has outstanding performance.

Create A More Peaceful Environment for Your Lovely Babies or Wife

Let’s take a closer look, and see what we discover!

Packed with Connectivity

Designed with 2 x USB 2.0 ports, 2 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x Type C (data transfer only), 1 x Gigabit Ethernet port, 1 x Micro SD Card port, 1 x HDMI port and 1x VGA port (# of Displays Supported: # of 2), 1 x Audio Jack port.

Strong Network Support

KAMRUI JK06 micro computer providing Wi-Fi-5, Bluetooth 4.2, 2.4G+5G dual band WiFi and network connectivity, these ensures you can do everything you want at the speeds you need.

Install the OS You Want

KAMRUI JK06 mini computer tower preinstalled Windows 11 pro OS. Moreover, if you want to install Windows 10, Ubuntu or Linux. The compact pc will support and be compatible with different operating systems.

Transfer Files in Seconds

Transfer movies, photos, and music at speeds of up to 5 Gbps via the USB-C port and the dual USB 3.0 ports, saving you time on large file transfers between your mini pc and external hard drives or networks.

To Create! To Win! Don’t Let the Storage Limit Your Imagination

Massive storage capacity for storing huge amounts of pictures, videos, music and more.

KAMRUI small form factor pc has 3 ways to expand the storage as below:

1. The micro SD card slot also support up to 128GB of expandable storage;

2. It’s expandable with the addition of up to 2 TB of 2.5-inch SSD or HDD[NOT INCLUDED] fitted in the base expansion box.

3. The mini pc designed with 4 USB ports which you can add USB flash drives[NOT INCLUDED] or external hard drives[NOT INCLUDED].

Designed for Those who Work and Study in A Small Space Without Much Room on Their Desk

With JK06 mini PC versatility, plus better connectivity with HDMI 2.0 (4K@60Hz) and VGA ports(1080 P), the compact and lightweight PC adapts to you.

The magnetic stand that comes with JK06 minipc as a gift, it is a capable and affordable Windows 11 Pro desktop computer that you can place almost anywhere given its small form factor. Whether vertical or horizontal style placed if you entered an idea bottleneck, why not try a different placed mode? If you don’t want to JK06 mini pc comes with the magnetic stand, just take the stand off to make it lay down on the desk. It’s time to think outside the box. Just put it on your desk in a different way as you want.

Not Only a Business Mini PC, But Also a Home Mini Computer

KAMRUI Express Service Channels and Warm Tips

*Regardless of your dissatisfaction with our products for any reason, please let us know so that the problem can be resolved promptly and quickly.

These are the steps to find the seller: “Log in Amazon” → “Your Account” → “Your orders” → “Ask Product Question.”

Service: We have a 12-month shelf life for return and exchange, the first reply within 24 hours, and 1-to-1 professional service personnel to answer any questions for you. Your use is only the beginning of our service.

Warm Tips:

Installing unofficial systems may cause driver incompatibility or instability. We highly recommended installing the official factory system.To avoid initial setup issues, the first time you use this mini pc, don’t connect network or wifi until the windows system of your mini pc is running.

【POWERFUL COMPUTING CAPACITY】The JK06 mini PC features a Quad-Core Intel 11th generation Jasper Laker N5100(4M Cache, up to 2.80 GHz). Lower power consumption of 6W makes it less heat, and more outstanding endurance performance than Intel Celeron J4125, N5105 and N5095 processors. It’s versatile enough to handle most any workload, light gaming or general computing. Whether you use it for professional or personal needs, it’ll give you all the power you require.
【ENJOY SPACE-SAVING WORKSPACE】The JK06 mini tower computer has black housing and a compact form factor that’s about 6.88×5.31×1.57-inch. A low-power PC that is so convenient that you can place this fully fetched Windows 11 Ready PC on your desk. With the free attached magnetic stand, you can place vertical or horizontal styles as you want. That is not the only advantage of the compact sized PC. With low power consumption, it’s a sleek alternative to a traditional tower PC.
【GREAT ASSISTANT FOR YOU】The JK06 mini desktop pc doesn’t just a honeycomb design, it also features ventilation holes on the housing to improve heat dissipation and reliability. This efficient thermal management keeps its cool even under the heaviest processing loads. Indeed, featuring the fanless design, when you work from home, and absolutely quiet micro computer will not disturb your cute babies or lovely pets.
【PERSONAL DATA DATABASE】8GB RAM memory means you get to the files that you need quicker. Storage 256GB M.2 Solid State Drive(MAX. 2TB), which provides plenty of storage room and high-performance responsiveness to access and run your applications quickly. There’s an SD card slot for additional storage. If you need more storage to expand, 2.5-inch SSD(MAX. 2TB)would be your great choice. Don’t let the storage to limit your imagination. To Creative, To Win.
【4K UHD DUAL SCREEN SUPPORT】The JK06 micro computer has one HDMI 2.0 and one VGA port that supports dual screen display, which setup has two modes-mirror or extended modes to analyze data better and improve work efficiency. Built-in Intel UHD Graphics, surfing websites using Chrome and other browsers, as well as watching Netflix, Youtube, Hulu, Philo, and other streaming services. It is fast enough to decode and accelerate UHD video content 4096×2160 video playback at 60 Hz.
【WORK AND PLAY ANYWHERE】The JK06 small PC has all the ports you need for all the peripherals you need including 1 x DC, 1 x Type C(data transfer only), 2 x USB 3.0, 2 x USB 2.0, 1 x LAN, 1 x HDMI, 1 x VGA, 1 x Audio in&out and 1 x TF Card slots. What’s more, it supports Linux, Wake On LAN, RTC Wake, and Auto Power On. Work and play your way virtually anywhere.
【FIND MORE PLEASURE ON JK06】The small form factor pc is perfect for a wide range of business scenarios, including signage, point-of-sale (POS) systems and intelligent vending machines. Whether it’s online chatting or professional video meetings, the dual band Wi-Fi 2.4G+5G connection is up to the task. It’s perfect for home office, light games, digital security and surveillance, digital signage, media center, conference room etc. Also Ideal for visually home entertainment, HTPC.
【ALL-AROUND PROTECTION】Say goodbye to the traditional desktop computer. KAMRUI JK06 mini pc with the magnetic holder which is equipped with a layer of silicone on the bottom. The comprehensive protection design makes leaves zero scratches on the desk. Moreover, whenever you need us, KAMRUI employees will always be here and handle all problems for you. Who wouldn’t want a mini pc? A great gift idea for your parent, friend, family or elders etc.

KAMRUI Mini PC

Choose KAMRUI, Choose Professional Mini PC

Product Description

Why Choose Beelink U59 Mini PC

Easy To Carry – Beelink MINI S Mini PC measures ‎4.52 x 4.01 x 1.61 inches and weighs as low as 11.35 ounces. You can hold it in your hand or put it in your business bag and carry it with you.

Cost-effective – Beelink Micro PC uses N5095CPU. Its base operating frequency is up to 2.9GHz (4C/4T) and it supports a 4 MB L3 Cache.

Multiple Interfaces – The desktop computer has a unique interface designed with 4 x USB3.0 ports, 2 x HDMI ports, 1 x DC Jack port, 1 x RJ45 1000M port, 1 x Audio Jack (HP&MIC) port, 1 x Type-C port.

Expandable Storage – The mini computers have two Internal Connector, one is M.2 2280 SSD, the other one is a 2.5-inch 7mm SATA HDD which support up to 500GB~2TB large expandable storage.

Support Auto Power On – The windows computer Support WOL (Wake On LAN) and Auto Power On functions, you can watch our demo video for operation, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact Beelink.

After-sales Service – Beelink focuses on mini pc R&D and sales. We have a professional after-sales service. As long as you purchase our products, We offer 1-year factory professional support & 7*24 hours online service.

N5095 Vs J4125

Mini PC Features

𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐥 𝐍𝟓𝟎𝟗𝟓 𝐂𝐏𝐔

This MINI S mini PC powered by Intel 11th Generation Quad-Core N5095 (More Faster Than 10th Generation J4125). It’s base operating frequency up to 2.9GHz (4C/4T) and it supports 4MB cache. Stable low-power processor with powerful performance, say goodbye to the system freezing and buffering.

𝐃𝐮𝐚𝐥 𝐒𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐧 𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐲

The Micro Computer is equipped with Dual HDMI 2.0 Ports. When you buy this computer, we will give you HDMI 100CM&20CM for free, you can connect two monitors at the same time, which can improve your work Efficiency.

𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢𝐩𝐥𝐞 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐚𝐜𝐞𝐬

The mini computer has a unique interface designed with 4 x USB3.0 ports, 2 x HDMI ports, 1 x DC Jack port, 1 x RJ45 1000M port, 1 x Audio Jack (HP&MIC) port. It can connect keyboard, mouse, camera, gamepad, monitor, TV, headset and sound, etc.

Common Question & Answer

Is Windows 11 Pro already installed?

A1: Yes, our beelink MINI S comes with Windows 11 Pro pre-installed. There is no need for an additional activation key. You are free to use another operating system, such as Linux, Android x86, Ubuntu, or FydeOS.

Q2: How to set up Dual Screen Display?

A2: Please click and select Start>Settings>System>Display. Your PC should automatically detect your monitor and display your desktop. If you don’t see the monitor, select Detect.

Q3: How to enter BIOS?

A3: Press “delete” to enter the BIOS settings; press “F7” to enter the boot options menu (click continuously immediately after booting).

Can I play video games?

Of course, you can play Minecraft, PUBG, Fortnite, GTA5, CS:Go, and LOL smoothly.

Powerful Performance: Beelink MINI S mini pc is powered by 11th Generation Quad-Core N5095 (More Faster Than 10th Generation J4125). The lithography process of the CPU is 10nm, and its base operating frequency is up to 2.9GHz (4C/4T) and it supports a 4MB smart cache. The micro pc Pre-installed W11 Pro 64-Bits Os, running smoothly. Create a smooth experience for your streaming video, visual home entertainment, and light office, bid farewell to system stalls and buffering.dget computadoras de escritorio
High-capacity Storage: The micro desktops computer built-in 8GB DDR4, 256GB M.2 SSD (M.2 is much better than mSATA in terms of both smaller size and higher transfer performance). The Mini Computer has two Internal Connector, one is M.2 SATA SSD 2280, the other one is a 2.5in-7mm SATA HDD which support up to 500GB~2TB large expandable storage. And also you can add a USB 3.0 hard drive port to expand 2TB HDD.
Multiple Interfaces & Function: The desktop computer adopts independently designed heat dissipation technology, and at the same time, it runs close to noiseless. The mini pc has a unique interface designed with 2 x HDMI ports, 4 x USB3.0 ports, 1 x RJ45 1000M Port, 1 x Audio Jack (HP&MIC) port. Supports connecting monitors, projectors, Mobile phones, and other equipment. Moreover, this computer supports Wake On LAN, Auto Power On, PXE Boot. To meet your various needs.
Dual Screen Display: The Micro Computer is equipped with Dual HDMI 2.0 Ports. When you buy this computer, we will give you HDMI 100CM&20CM for free, you can connect two monitors at the same time, which can improve your work Efficiency. The Beelink mini pc uses Intel UHD Graphics to support 4K HD video playback. You can easily enjoy 4K video playback, or connect to your projector as a home theater and enjoy various entertainment.
Widely Used & Safety: The Beelink Mini PC can be used for visual home entertainment, office, light games, digital security, surveillance, digital signage, billboards, media center, conference room, etc. In addition, the cheap pc also supports Linux operating system(ubuntu), meets server construction, software compilation, or other DIY needs. All of our desktop computers obtained FCC, ROSH, CE certification. We also offer 1-year factory professional support & 7*24 hours online customer service.

it’s very suitable for business work, school study, and home entertainment.

[ 14 INCHES LAPTOP WINDOWS 11 ] – It comes with Windows 11 Pro system, new look and feel, maximize your productivity, with a 14 inches micro-edge Full HD (1920 x 1080) IPS screen, you can enjoy clear, bright and vivid picture.
[ CONVENIENCE AND WARRANTY ] – Experience smooth wireless connection with 802.11.ac 2.4G/5G WiFi and Bluetooth 4.2. Rich-ports include 2 USB 3.0, Mini HD, DC Charging, Audio jack, Micro SD slot. All Tulasi laptops come with a 1-year warranty, you can enjoy it.

Product Description

Unlock the mystery of the Beelink GTR5 5900HX with your fingerprint!

Beelink Take you to enjoy work and life Fingerprint unlocking: convenient, high security

We have been committed to the production and research and development of Mini-PCs for 12 years. since 2010, one line from research and development to delivery, because professional, so rest assured.

AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX Running score

AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX leads the pack in cpu score test data

Rich Interface design

USB3.2*4

USB 2.0*2

HDMI*1

DP * 1

Porta Gigabit Ethernet * 2

Digitare-c*1

Power cooling system

Powerful big fan escort, use it to your heart’s content, no need to worry about computer heating

The games FPS testing

Can support a wide range of games to suit your choice

Beelink GTR5, With AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX CPU, CPU core with 7th generation processing technology, 8C/16T, all performance can surprise you, let technology change life and improve happiness!

Wi-Fi 6E+ BT5.2

WiFi 6E – low latency and high data throughput to enhance your gaming experience and keep your computer running while completing arithmetic-heavy data calculations.

Blue tooth – transmit and receive more data at faster speeds, with low power consumption and time-limited data communication for more efficient connectivity.

Choose the highly intelligent Beelink GTR5 5900HX Mini PC, which is faster and more durable. Get a Mini PC with a difference!

Genuine W11

Windows 11 has a new Start Menu and Taskbar experience, a multi-window capture layout that allows users to view their Microsoft information on the desktop, a new App Store for installing your favorite apps, games, movies, a Bluetooth audio experience with Widgets widgets, an open ecosystem, storage health monitoring, a virtual desktop experience, and an improved Bluetooth audio experience…

And much more!

New interface, simple and efficient

For a smart office, choose the Belink GTR5-5900HX

Dual 2.5G RJ45

The dual 2.5G RJ45 propagates at a faster speed of 2500Mbps, with a network transmission rate Around 300MB/s. It can be used in a wider range of environments, not only at home, in the office, on high speed trains, but also in high speed broadband and in the natural environment, achieving the “freedom to work” and reducing environmental constraints. The freedom to work and to reduce environmental restrictions.

Less obstruction and less time wasted. Let the Beelink GTR5 5900HX give you more freedom!

Dual DMIC hole language control

With the perfect use of artificial intelligence language, you can listen to your needs more clearly and precisely, set the language in the system, “communicate” with the computer, free your hands, use the computer at busy times and maximise your work efficiency, making your work easy and fun.

Beelink GTR 5 is inviting you to “chat”, please accept!

Keeping comfortable environment
